@DavidWells @sbarski @StegerPatrick @Netlify I'd be interested in this blog post too. As an aside, Netlify's hosting infrastructure is cloud provider agnostic and has in-built redundancy across the large providers. So we should be able to weather disruptions to any of the underlying systems.
